fixes.name: Delta Down T
fixes.solution_explanation: Row-level passthrough of the Tableau calculated field [Delta Down T] which maps directly to [DELTA_DOWN]; created as a calculated column because it operates at the row level.

fixes.name: Delta Down T EUR
fixes.solution_explanation: Translated Tableau calculated field [Delta Down T EUR] = [Delta Down T]*[TO_EUR] into a row-level calculated column using the previously created [Delta Down T] and the [TO_EUR] column.

fixes.name: MUSH Delta Down T EUR
fixes.dax_expression: IF('Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[CURRENCY] = "EUR", 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T EUR], 0)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau IF statement to DAX IF; returns [Delta Down T EUR] when CURRENCY = "EUR" otherwise 0. This is row-level logic so it is implemented as a calculated column.
